title: Designing super-fast trimodal sponges using recycled polypropylene for organics cleanup | Scientific Reports - Nature.com
summary: The article details the creation of a polypropylene (PP)-based thin film sorbent with a trimodal structure, demonstrating its oil sorption and separation capabilities, mechanical strength, recyclability, sorption kinetics, and oil-water separation efficiency.
likely_naics_codes: Likely NAICS Codes: 325211 - Plastics Material and Resin Manufacturing, 562998 - All Other Miscellaneous Waste Management Services, 212393 - Other Chemical and Fertilizer Mineral Mining, 324110 - Petroleum Refineries

title: Trützschler and Balkan join forces for textile recycling - The Textile Magazine
summary: The article discusses a partnership between Trützschler Group and Balkan Textile Machinery for a complete recycling solution, turning waste into value. They offer technologically leading machinery for rotor and ring yarns from recycled materials, with a focus on sustainability in the textile chain.
likely_naics_codes: Likely NAICS Codes: 333249 - Other Industrial Machinery Manufacturing, 313110 - Fiber, Yarn, and Thread Mills, 313210 - Broadwoven Fabric Mills, and 325220 - Artificial and Synthetic Fibers and Filaments Manufacturing

title: Celebrating 75 Years of the Very Best Kiwi Farming - MiNDFOOD
summary: The article discusses Silver Fern Farms, a company committed to sustainable farming practices and producing high-quality, grass-fed meat products.
likely_naics_codes: Likely NAICS Codes: 112112 - Cattle Feedlots; 1123 - Poultry and Egg Production; 311612 - Meat Processed from Carcasses; 311612 - Meat Processed from Carcasses and Other Meats
